clues.text: The Blue branch of this river begins near Bahir Dar in Ethiopia

2 hours for this work where Jonathan Swift satirically suggests cooking Irish babies; it's "a modest" 3,400 words, 1,700 an hour
This George Eliot novel about Dorothea Brooke has 86 chapters, so they must average about 10 pages

rounds.comments: (Mayim: All responses will be made up of letters in the word "encyclopedia".)

clues.text: A type of this implement is used for filling in sparse eyebrows

Of her Nov. 29, 1872 trial hearing: "Did you have any doubt yourself of your right to vote?"  Her reply: "Not a particle"

rounds.text: 2 of the 1st 3 men depicted on U.S. stamps
rounds.response: (2 of) George Washington, Benjamin Franklin & Thomas Jefferson
